events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but I want to request a refund because the size is completely wrong and it does not fit me at all.
The customer issue has been categorised as a Refund request due to size-related return inquiry.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund and return issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags for us to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 4589023. The jacket is brand new, I haven’t worn it and the tags are still attached as you requested.
Thank you for confirming. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label. Once we receive it, we will process the refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the detailed instructions. I will send it back as soon as possible.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance with the return and refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to send back the jacket and if you received the refund without any issues.
Yes, I sent the jacket on the 17th and the refund was processed yesterday. Everything went smoothly, thank you for your help!
We are glad to hear that your refund was successful. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on the support you received.
